summary: Cayenne peppers are a type of hot chili pepper used to add spice to food. They are long, skinny, and usually red, growing downward from the plant. These peppers measure 30,000 to 50,000 Scoville units for heat. Dried and ground, they make cayenne powder, which can be used in cooking or as a supplement. Even though the powder is named after cayenne peppers, it might include other types of peppers too.
title: Cayenne pepper
